sentences.sentence: But I would like this life which moves and yearns in me, to be able itself to attain to comeliness, though but in transitory performance.
sentences.translation: 但是我宁愿这个在我身体上活动着、渴望着的生命本身能够实现些许美好，哪怕只是昙花一现的表现。

sentences.sentence: Butt I would like this life which moves and yearns in me, to be able itself to attain to comeliness, though but in transitory performance.
sentences.translation: 但是我宁愿这个在我身体上活动着、渴望着的生命本身能够实现些许美好，哪怕只是昙花一现的表现。

sentences.sentence: And thy renown went forth among the heathen for thy beauty: for it was perfect through my comeliness, which I had put upon thee, saith the Lord GOD.
sentences.translation: 你美貌的名声传在列邦中，你十分美貌，是因我加在你身上的威荣。这是主耶和华说的。
